cards.name: v0.1.2 - card archive functionality
cards.description:
- when user is in edit mode, hide the the `Archive`/`Unarchive` button
- when a card is archived, it should be hidden from the column
- action menu should have a toggle to show archived cards

cards.name: v0.1.3 - column archive functionality
cards.description:
- when a column is archived, it should be hidden from the board
- action menu should have a toggle to show archived columns

cards.name: v0.1.4 - board archive functionality
cards.description:
- when a board is archived, it should be hidden from the boards page
- action menu should have a toggle to show archived boards
- update edit board modal button

cards.name: v0.1.6 - document titles
cards.description:
- add proper document titles to each page in app
- `/`: gitlo.app
- `/boards`: Boards · gitlo.app
- `/boards/<board_id>`: <board_name> · gitlo.app

cards.name: v0.1.5 - reusable atom components
cards.description:
extract the following buttons so it can be reused in various molecule and organism components:
- archive
- unarchive
- close
- cancel
- edit
- update
